metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0098 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Screen Capture in Google Chrome on Chrome OS prior to97.0.4692.71 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to perform specificuser gestures to potentially exploit heap corruption via specific usergestures.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
